channel.title: [317] How to make NPC's hit more?
channel.description: Well my King Black Dragon drops D Plate, but it only hits 2 so it is way to easy to kill him. How do I make it hit more (like 50's)? :confused:

item.title: [317] How to make NPC's hit more?
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

If you go into your NPChandler and search

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad hitDiff = misc.random(99);

part of the above, I believe the max hit is the number in the ( ) , the one above shows (99).

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How to make NPC's hit more?

item.title: [317] How to make NPC's hit more?
item.dc:creator: @lewiskitapci lewiskitapci
item.description:
@lewiskitapci wrote:

[quote=“robinator002, post:3, topic:271419”]it still only hit 2[quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=358166.msg2735109#msg2735109 date=1239011588]
go into - NPCHANLER.JAVA

i cant explain the rest, but look for this

hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(60);

where it says 5, that;s the lowest the monster will hit…

Where it says 60, thats the highest it can hit.
[/quote]
it still only hit 2’s… And I did what you said… So what now?[/quote]
have you tryed changing the lowest value to 30+ if not try that and the highest value to 48

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How to make NPC's hit more?
